contest-event.event-date: Nov. 8, 1986 D National Mineworkers (Second Section) National Mineworkers (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-second-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Second Rococo Variations on a Theme of Tchaikovsky [Street] Winter Gardens, Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK Prizes 1st £500, 2nd £425, 3rd £350, 4th £275, 5th £200, 6th £125. 14 bands competed. 24th annual contest March 13, 2012, 9:06 p.m. July 18, 2016, 7:41 a.m. 1 Barnsley Brass Steve Sykes 2 Askern Colliery Band Graham O'Connor 3 Lochgelly Band George Bennett 4 Strata Brass Barry Thompson 5 Dodworth Colliery MW Brass Brian Rostron 6 Bestwood Welfare Black Diamonds Band Bernard Wilson 6 Longannet Colliery (Cowdenbeath) Murray Slater Unknown Result Newstead Brass B. G.
